    router.param((req, res, next, value) => {
    // @ts-ignore
    const user = USERS[value]
    
    if (!user) = {

        err.statusCode = 404
	    throw err
    }
})

    app.use((err, req, res, next) => {
	res.statusCode = err.statusCode || 500
    res.send(err.message)
})
